title: Juice Masters Download
text: Its a fruit matching frenzy with a juicy twist!Youve just opened a new juice bar in town and its already getting busy. Crowds of thirty customers are coming through the doors and its up to you to make juicy fruit smoothies and serve them as fast as possible.A FRUITY MATCH 3 PUZZLEYoull need to match 3 or more of the same fruit to add juice to their glass. When its full the customer is happy! Its not just about serving customers, its about getting the highest score possible and matching as much fruit as possible!INSANE FRUIT COMBOSMatch different combinations of fruit to create special fruit with unique powers, such as the explosive fruit mine, X power, and special seed. These special combinations are the key to getting huge scores! Combine 2 special fruits to get a master fruit thatll help you get EPIC scores. Its the ultimate move on Juice Master!UNLOCK POWER-UPSEach level gets progressively more difficult and you may need a little help completing the challenging stages. As you level up, youll gain access to useful power-ups to help match fruit, make delicious smoothies and have lots of happy customers.Master the power-ups such as the hammer, knife, mixer and magic wand to help you complete the difficult stages, get huge scores and dominate the leaderboard.FRUIT MASTER JUICY FEATURES:Get daily rewards including money and boosters1000 challenging levels more coming soon!Spin the wheel of fortune to get free rewards every dayCompete for the highest score on the leaderboardMake juicy smoothies for thirsty customers at the barMatch 3 or more identical fruits to earn pointsKeep matching fruits to fill the customers glassChain together multiple combinations for huge scoresMatch special combinations to create powerful fruits like the fruit mine, X power, and special seedMatch 2 special fruits for the ultimate fruit blasting comboEarn power-ups as you level up and unlock hammers, knives, mixers, magic wands and moreWith over 1000 levels and more being added with every update, Fruit Master gives fans of the classic match 3 game hours of juicy city fun!DOWNLOAD FREE TODAY & JOIN IN THE FRUIT MATCHING FRENZYIf you have any questions or need support, please email us at info@launchshipstudios.com
